column3: Traffic;Kampong Speu: Two young men died at the scene after a car hit their motorcycle. The accident occurred on the night of March 22
column6: between Kilometer No. 2-3 in Ampil village. Sambor commune
column8: Kampong Speu province.------Samrong Tong district police officer said that two victims were Leng Vutha
column11: both from Kampong Speu province.------The car
column13: was being driven by a Ukrainian named  VLADYSLAY SKYBIN
column16: with a visa expiring on May 28 2019.------ Sources said that the bodies of the two young men were handed over to their families. The vehicles were taken to the Samrong Tong district police station. The driver is currently detained and legal proceedings are underway.
